content: UI/UX Designer, portrait photographer based at Namur

In a philosophy of accessibility and to offer the experience best suited to the browsing context, the site is fully dynamic. Dark mode allows the user to consult the site according to his display preference.

Every day a different font is used. The color depends on the day, hours and minutes. The choice of language is also available to allow everyone to consult my portfolio, whether you are English or French.
Developped by Elie Durieux in the scolary context of HEAJ for DWT section
